portfolio.title: Reddit Clone App

portfolio.title: OpenAI CartPole Problem
portfolio.description: Using Deep Q-Learning and Proximal Policy Optimisation to the popular Cartpole Problem.

testimonial.description: Very logical, very teachable and a good listener. A good fit for finance and tech industry.
He is passionate about tech and driven by impact. Always leverages tech for impacts.
Great partner to work with, always defends my ideas and carries it through.
